item.title: Hugo, Github, Travis: a step in continuous deployment!
item.description: I (Kevin) recently rebuilt my personal website and I was eager to set up the same workflow Steve built for our blog (this blog!), i.e. a combination of Hugo, Github and Travis. I though this was a good opportunity to detail how it works and so I wrote this post with Steve. Note that there are several blog posts on the topic available online, for instance here and here. We did our best to complement them in the following post.
